ModMetaData.name: ETRT: Tribal Apparel
ModMetaData.author: Evil Tactician
ModMetaData.description: Stand-alone Release of Tribal Apparel Part of: Evil Tactician's RimWorld Tweaks Tribal Apparel - Added Fur Coat, Fur Hat, Desert Robe and Desert Head Wrap for Tribals in harsh conditions. - Textures (with permission) from spoonshortage's FashionRIMsta mod. - Compatible with FashionRIMsta if you want to use the full set, just load my mod after hers. - Added Wolf Hood, Deer Hood, Megascarab Hood, Megaspider Hood and Spelopede Helm. - Each have subtle bonuses for specific roles within the tribe to add some variety early game. - Textures (with permission) from Diana Kitty's Tribal Hoods mod. Credits spoonshortage - Very talented graphics artist, for her awesome textures. Diana (Kitty) - Tribal Hoods Textures.
